notes: Modern loft-style apartment with mezzanine sleeping area accessed by steep stairs with a curved metal railing â€” a significant baby safety hazard as the open loft edge and staircase pose fall risks. The unit is clean and well-furnished with white decor, but the loft layout makes it impractical for a family with a baby.
